# 0.1.*
description: 
> provide some useful plot types
* 0.1.0: start 
    * create figure and axis
    * curve maybe suppoort (I forget it)
* 0.1.1: curves 
    * from data with `x` and `y` `set_data()`
    * from fn with `x` and a function to colculate `y` `set_fn()`
    * from parametric with `t`, `fx` , `fy` set_parametric()
* 0.1.2: stair  
    * from data with `x` and `y` `set_data()`

* 0.1.5: area(to 0.1.3)
  |
* 0.1.3: histogram(to 0.1.4)
  |-those two type has the same api 
  * `set_data` `add_data` need x and y
  * `set_data_prototype` just need y, x is generated by `y`, this api has the finest control
  * `set_data_with_step` `set_data_norm` process `set_data_prototype`  
* 0.1.4: error bars(incresed) 

* 0.1.6: scatter

* 0.1.7: add doc comments
